ygData.subject: RE: A bit o help
ygData.msgSnippet: The assassin and supplier are in the same room. as I foudn oout earlier.... -Martyn ... From: Kyle Sibbald [mailto:ksibbald@execpc.com] Sent: Thursday,
ygData.messageBody:
The assassin and supplier are in the same room. as I foudn oout earlier....
-Martyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Kyle Sibbald [mailto:ksibbald@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 10:48 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] A bit o help


From: "Kyle Sibbald" <ksibbald@...>

I personally have not found a decent map of Lower Guk dead side that
indicates any of the rooms. One of the best sites for maps that I have found
is the following:

http://www.nx.sakura.ne.jp/~chizuya/indexe.html

Most of it is in Japanese and there are few points of interest marked on
the maps but as far as finding your way around it is damn near perfect.

I also do not know where the Assassin is but people who hunt the Supplier
also seem to hunt the Assassin at the same time so they must be relatively
close. On Maps' Guk Bottom Dead Side the Basalts are in the area with the
'A' and the Supplier is in the square room above the 'To B1'. I'd guess the
Assassin would be somewhere between the 'To B1' and 'C' maybe.

Another good spot for maps is this place:

http://www.medvecky.com/EQ/NOREQMaps.htm

This is basically a collection of different maps from different people
including many from the Japanese site above. I don't think any original maps
exist here.

Good Journey

Sineras Silverlyre, The Divine Alliance (Cazic-Thule)

-----Original Message-----
From: Joshua R. Moore [mailto:josh@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 8:48 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] A bit o help


From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>

I have a boon to ask of ye, me friends.
I have need of a better map to the ruins of lower Guk. The maps I have found
from the many cartographers around fail to lead me true.
Any help you may offer in this manner would be greatly appreciated.
-Martyn

[OOC: The maps out there that I have found fail to show the Assassin room. I
would love to be able to get there, or near, to get a basalt Carapace to
wear (and perhaps one of the new masks)
I was in lower Guk much of last night, and both were up for free loot, but I
could not find a guide to the assassin room. by the time I did find a guide
(a few hours later), There were only 20 people in the zone, and bad things
were everywhere. I did get greaves and gauntlets. Much better to wear than
bronze]
